price: (Kaafiroonni yeroo adabicha argan) “Gooftaa keenya! Adabicha nurraa kaasi nuti ni amannaa” (jedhu).
arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ik'shif ʿannā al-ʿadhāba innā mu'minūna
